location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.348 of 1852 from Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Major Atkins Hamerton, Her Majesty's Consul and Agent in the dominions of His Highness the Imam of Muscat

mods.abstract: Copy of a covering letter, the original of which was enclosed (not included in the file) with a petition received by Kemball from five Hindu merchants of Bunder Abbas [Bandar-e ʻAbbās], relating to claims made upon the late Shaikh Syf ben Nubhan.
